alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:51PM CDT until June 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CLARKE AND SOUTHWESTERN LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Savoy, or 12 miles southwest of Meridian, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Enterprise around 455 PM CDT. Savoy around 500 PM CDT. Sable around 515 PM CDT. Zero around 520 PM CDT. Middleton around 530 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
